title: Power Play
description: It is a truth universally acknowledged that a playboy wants a one-night stand... No strings attached. Gabriel Hill dates someone new every night. Glamorous parties and smoke-filled clubs. He has no interest in the prim little baker. Until he finds out she's connected to his family's downfall.He wants information. Revenge. And worst of all, he wants Elise Bettencourt in his bed. Again and again and again.There's no future between them.A woman who's fought to build a new life for herself.And the man who will bring it all down.
author: Amelia Wilde
